original_title: SLT-MOBITEL Enterprise provides security portfolio for organisations to safeguard Data and IT infrastructure
original_body_lines: SLT-MOBITEL, the National ICT Solutions Provider, understands that as technology continues to evolve, so do the threats and increasing incidents of sophisticated cyberattacks. As businesses shift processes to cloud and digital platforms to serve their customers better, reliable and resilient digital transformation can only be achieved when it has a foundation of cybersecurity beneath it. Providing Enterprises, a comprehensive suite of advanced cyber security solutions SLT-MOBITEL is ensuring every point and network layer is protected.

Additionally, the cybercrime landscape growing increasingly professionalized has resulted in more numerous, subtle, and sophisticated threats. Based on the 2022 Official Cybercrime Report by Cybersecurity Ventures, reports indicate that predicted cybercrime cost in 2023 will be $8 trillion and grow to $10.5 trillion by 2025.

SLT-MOBITEL Enterprise now offers, large and medium businesses, government institutions, SME and micro businesses, high-performance cybersecurity solutions with next generation managed security services to help them succeed in the global arena.

These security solutions go beyond basic firewalls and antivirus software but offer cutting edge solutions with advanced security features, to help businesses have peace of mind, stay ahead of potential security threats enabling faster response times and helping protect data so as to reduce business risk.SLT Managed Security offers are boosted by a rich portfolio including a Managed Firewall, DDoS Protection service, Web Application Firewall (WAF), Cloud security and Vulnerability Assessment Services.
